name: The Weir Group PLC
goal: The Weir Group is a UK based global manufacturer of equipment (pumps and valves) for the Minerals and Mining, Oil and Gas, and Power and Industrial markets
euInitiatives:
The Weir Group would like to introduce our company to EC members and explore how our capabilities within our industry could be leveraged to achieve the goals within the European Commission.

We will be visiting Brussels to attend meetings with various EU Institutions and agencies to discuss the feasibility of gaining support relating to the Hydraulic Fracturing technique that is currently being used to gain access to reserves of Oil and Gas held in underground rock formations.

However, our offerings are broad and deep, and we are also keen to gain insights from the EC members as to their perspectives on how Weir Group could bring value to ongoing and future EC needs in the engineering industry across a more comprehensive landscape.

The Weir Group intend to apply under Horizon 2020 Funding.
